mapper.insert:
insert into sys_task
business_id, business_code, business_name, state, exec_count, params, sys_code, creator, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, att1, att2, attribute, plan_id, numa1, numa2, remark, task_server, render_server, render_way, priority, pic_id, render_task_id, pic_download_state, instruction_time, suspend_time, render_type, pic_download_time, render_money task_config render_channel
#{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{execCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{att1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numa1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numa2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskServer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{renderServer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{renderWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{renderTaskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picDownloadState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{instructionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{suspendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{renderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picDownloadTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{renderMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskConfig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{renderChannel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_task st WHERE st.`business_id` = #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND st.state IN(0,1,11,12);
